meaningMnemonic: What is the greatest <kanji>art</kanji> a <kanji>person</kanji> can possess? It’s got to be the art of making people laugh. That’s why this means <vocabulary>comedian</vocabulary>, though it can also mean a <vocabulary>performer</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>entertainer</vocabulary> more generally.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
